mapper.insert: insert into productincludeInfo(price, content, aboutGame, releasedDate, releasedStatus, pcode, includePname) values(#{price}, #{content},#{aboutGame}, #{releasedDate}, #{releasedStatus}, #{pcode}, #{includePname});
mapper.select:
select t1.*, t2.uuid, t2.uploadPath, t2.fileName, t2.pcode, t2.screenType
from productincludeInfo t1 left join attach t2 on t1.includeId = t2.includeId where t1.includeId= #{includeId}

select t1.*, t2.uuid, t2.uploadPath, t2.fileName, t2.screenType
from product t1 left join attach t2 on t1.pcode = t2.pcode where t1.pcode=#{pcode}
mapper.insert: insert into product(pname, companyCode, lowGenrue, middleGenrue, highGenrue, flatform, price, content, aboutGame, systemMinRequirements, systemMaxRequirements, totalArcheive, releasedDate, releasedStatus) values(#{pname}, #{companyCode}, #{lowGenrue}, #{middleGenrue}, #{highGenrue}, #{flatform}, #{price}, #{content}, #{aboutGame}, #{systemMinRequirements}, #{systemMaxRequirements}, #{totalArcheive}, #{releasedDate}, #{releasedStatus});
